item.title: Water, Health and Development
item.description:
Water, Health and Development

During autumn 2015 both the Dutch Waterboard "WaterNet" (Amsterdam) and Van Hall Larenstein Univ. of Appl. Sci., (Velp) decided to join the Alliance to support and contribute to its mission. "Waternet" has a great expertise in water sanitation and drinkwater supply.

item.title: Water Quality in the Bandung Basin (Upper Citarum River Basin), West Java, Indonesia
item.description:
Water Quality in the Bandung Basin (Upper Citarum River Basin), West Java, Indonesia

An impression of the water quality in the Upper Citarum River Basin, West Java, Indonesia. Situation in January-June 2015.
